response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and utility, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $11,000. This price reflects its quality and the opportunity it presents for you, while also ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with this exceptional product.", "product_price": 11000}
